name: Tevaera
description: Tevaera is a UX-first gaming ecosystem powered by the ZK Stack and AI, designed to be fun and fair. With over a million Soulbound Gamers, Tevaera is on a community-driven mission to redefine gaming through multi-genre Web3 games powered by Teva Chain, innovative gaming agents, and a robust gaming stack. Tevaeraâ€™s flagship game, Teva Run, available on web, iOS, and Android, has surpassed 20 million multiplayer matches, showcasing the project's momentum in reshaping Web3 gaming.
